nodes.body: “Work with someone awesome?  1. Send them an email with some specific, detailed feedback. How do they add value, help others, solve problems, etc...? 2. CC their manager, manager's manager, and HR. 3. Send it!  You'll feel good, they'll feel great, and you'll help their career.”
